aboutUs.welcomeMessage: Welcome to [Your Library App Name], your ultimate destination for accessing knowledge, exploring stories, and connecting with a world of information. We believe that libraries are more than just collections of books—they’re gateways to imagination, innovation, and growth.
aboutUs.mission: To empower individuals and communities by providing a seamless digital library experience, making knowledge and stories accessible to everyone.

services.name: Digital Book Collection
services.description: Explore a vast library of books, articles, and multimedia resources at your fingertips.

services.name: Personalized Reading
services.description: Create custom reading lists and track your progress effortlessly.

services.name: Community Engagement
services.description: Connect with fellow readers through reviews, recommendations, and discussions.

services.name: AI-Powered Suggestions
services.description: Discover new books and topics based on your interests with our intelligent recommendations.

services.name: AI-Story Generator
services.description: Unleash your imagination with our AI-powered story creator, designed to craft unique tales tailored to your input.

points: Accessibility: Enjoy your library anywhere, anytime with our user-friendly platform.
Personalization: Tailored features to enhance your reading journey.
Innovation: Cutting-edge technology to simplify your search for knowledge.
Community: A space to connect with like-minded book enthusiasts.

values: Learning: Inspiring curiosity and lifelong education.
Innovation: Continuously improving to provide the best digital library experience.
Community: Building connections through shared knowledge and stories.
Accessibility: Ensuring everyone can access the resources they need.
aboutUs.closingMessage: Thank you for letting us be a part of your journey. Whether you're a student, a book enthusiast, or someone eager to learn, [Your Library App Name] is here to support your growth and curiosity.

contactInfo.message: Have questions or need assistance? Contact us at [your contact information] or visit [your website link] to learn more.
